thread.title: Great hotel, perfect location .
thread.title_full: Great hotel, perfect location . - Review of Hotel Diocleziano, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Alex V
title: Great hotel, perfect location .
text: We stayed at this Hotel for 4 night. Very easy to get from airport, you can take the Leonard Express from airport direct to Termini station , hotel just a couple minutes walking. Staff very friendly , we arrived early and were able to do a very early checkin. Breakfast was included in our room rate, good selection of fresh fruits, cheese, fresh squeezed orange juice, capuchinho coffee , served by a very friendly girl, every body at the hotel spoke English. No complains about the location, very easy to get anywhere , by foot or by public transportation , we bought the Rome 3 day pass, which gave us umlimeted access to bus and subway, plus free entrave to Castle Saint Angelo and Colesium ,roma foro palatino hill. I really recommend this Hotel
